Set in a spacious prestige private court just behind the Monash Aquatic Centre and Glen Waverley Tennis Club is this lovely home nestled in tranquil gardens. On entering you are greeted by the separate lounge on your left, with a dining room or convert to study 5th bedroom to your right, leading through to the open plan kitchen meals family area with its big windows taking in the gorgeous tranquil gardens and sun light. There has been new bathrooms and kitchen installed with caesarstone benchtops, induction hotplates and double oven, giving that modern feel. Upstairs there is an open family games area, full bathroom, a massive master bedroom with sitting area for quiet contemplation or reading your favourite book, along with three more good size bedrooms. You have the comfort of gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling upstairs, and remote door on the double garage. A lovely location for walks or bike rides along Scotchmans Creek Trail and Callaghan Reserve, or for the sports enthusiast the Central Reserve Sporting Grounds, tennis clubs and aquatic centre.

Also benefits from the modern comfort and ease of ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a double auto garage. ,In a pocket that's surrounded by family friendly amenities including the expansive grounds of Jells Park, the newly updated Wellesley Road playspace or the duck pond of Monash Gallery overlooked by the library. Also close to Jells Road village including Woolworths, the Big Watermelon for fresh vegetables, the Glen Shopping Centre, train station, Mountview Primary School, Brentwood Secondary College and Caulfield Grammar.

Embrace a life of ultimate convenience with this tastefully updated home, situated within a stroll of highly regarded local schools and popular Brentwood Reserve.,Nestled in a tranquil tree-lined enclave, this expansive double storey residence impresses instantly with its sizeable 663m2 (approx.) corner block, opening to reveal freshly painted interiors with new timber flooring and soft plush carpet.,Awash with natural light, the flowing lower level introduces a calming living room for cosy TV evenings, merging seamlessly with a spacious dining area and versatile sitting zone.,Gazing out to the covered entertainers' deck, glistening pool and established easycare yard, the country-style kitchen is perfectly placed with sparkling stone benchtops and quality appliances.,Of the four generous bedrooms, three are located downstairs with easy access to the elegant family bathroom, which has been transformed with a chic freestanding bath, frameless shower and glossy floor-to-ceiling tiles.,The primary bedroom savours the peace and privacy of its own exclusive floor, promising a serene hideaway for busy parents with its walk-in robe, flexible study space and stylish ensuite.,Boosting comfort levels, finishing touches comprise ducted heating and split-system air conditioning, plus mirrored built-in robes, a single garage and carport.,When it comes to desirable locations, this coveted pocket of Glen Waverley is sought-after due to its exceptional convenience, placing its residents within walking distance of Glen Waverley South Primary School, Brentwood Secondary College and Brandon Park Shopping Centre.,It's also moments from prestigious private schools such as Caulfield Grammar, while close to The Glen, Glen Waverley Station and the Monash Freeway.,This impressive move-in ready home is a perfect find for buyers seeking modern comfort within easy access of all amenities.
